results.title: A resolution congratulating the University of North Carolina Tar Heels basketball team for winning the 2016-2017 National Collegiate Athletic Association men's basketball national championship.
results.short_title: A resolution congratulating the University of North Carolina Tar Heels basketball team for winning the 2016-2017 National Collegiate Athletic Association men's basketball national championship.
results.committees: Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation Committee
results.latest_major_action: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Congratulates the University of North Carolina for winning the 2016-2017 National Collegiate Athletic Association men's basketball national championship.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Congratulates the University of North Carolina for winning the 2016-2017 National Collegiate Athletic Association men's basketball national championship.

actions.description: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation discharged by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2535-2536)
Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. (text of measure as introduced: CR S2461-2462)
